DocAttribute.Name: XLength
DocAttribute.Documentation: The length of the base measured along the placement X axis. It is provided by the inherited axis placement through _SELF\IfcCsgPrimitive3D.Position.P[1]_.

DocAttribute.Name: YLength
DocAttribute.Documentation: The length of the base measured along the placement Y axis. It is provided by the inherited axis placement through _SELF\IfcCsgPrimitive3D.Position.P[2]_.

DocAttribute.Name: Height
DocAttribute.Documentation: The height of the apex above the plane of the base, measured in the direction of the placement Z axis, the _SELF\IfcCsgPrimitive3D.Position.P[2]_.
